>
[Majordomo Torc](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2398)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 195 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +13; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) and 1 imparted language)

**Skills** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +13, [Nobility Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +13

**Int** +3, **Wis** +3, **Cha** +3

**Will** +14 

</column>

---        

Forged in platinum, a _majordomo torc_ is engraved with heraldic insignias along with one language's alphabet, much like a [_choker of elocution_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=422). You gain a +1 item bonus to [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) checks and the ability to understand, speak, and write the torc's language. Your excellent elocution reduces the DC of the flat check to perform an auditory action while [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) from 5 to 3.

 Upon being invested, the torc appoints itself your majordomo and, given the chance, takes over coordinating your social calendar, engagements, and wardrobe. A _majordomo torc_ has a prim, fussy disposition, and although it defers to you, it can grow sardonic if you frequently ignore its advice. The torc has the following activation.

<document level="2" id="action-1956" />

</column>
